[19/07/25, 1:36:49â€¯PM] GOAT: Hi Henry

[19/07/25, 1:41:20â€¯PM] Henry Voyex: What are the details?
[19/07/25, 1:44:02â€¯PM] GOAT: Linkupâ€¯â€”â€¯AIâ€‘Powered Dealâ€‘Flow OS
Investorâ€‘ready pitch decks, workflows & insights in minutes, not months

The Problem
Founders hustle for weeks stitching forms, decks and coldâ€‘emails, while investors drown in unvetted PDFs and messy spreadsheets. The result: 45â€‘day average from first intro to a serious call, and portfolio monitoring that takes 14â€¯days every quarter.

The Solution
Linkup is a multiâ€‘sided SaaS that automates discovery, diligence, closing and postâ€‘investment reporting for founders, investors, brokers and expertsâ€”backed by a growing suite of Genâ€‘AI utilities.

Core Module	Key Capabilities
Deal Desk	Custom intake forms with MARP deck parser and smart completeness scoring.
AI Deck Suite	NEWâ€”AI Pitchâ€‘Deck Generator turns a 10â€‘question brief into a professional, onâ€‘brand slide deck inâ€¯<â€¯5â€¯min (v1.0 Augâ€¯2025).
Portfolio OS	Cohort benchmarking, KPI reminders & automated tearâ€‘sheets.
Marketplace	â€œPitchâ€¯Readyâ€ service bundle (deckâ€¯+â€¯modelâ€¯+â€¯oneâ€‘pager) with vetted freelancers.

AI Superâ€‘powers
Live Pitchâ€‘Deck Generator â€” instant storyline, dataâ€‘visuals & design presets.

Naturalâ€‘language Application Filler â€” preâ€‘populates any investor or grant form, cutting dataâ€‘entry by 70â€¯%.

Smart Affinity Scoring ranks startups vs. each investorâ€™s historical thesis.

Autoâ€‘summaries & boardâ€‘pack PDFs from founder updates.

Quantified Impact
Workflow	Today	With Linkup
Startup Setup	30â€“45â€¯days	<â€¯7â€¯days (â€‘85â€¯%)
Quarterly compliance pack	3â€¯days	<â€¯1â€¯day

Market & Traction
(To be used from deck, same data for TAM SAM SOM)

Proposed 90â€‘day pilot with DSTâ€¯Punjab &â€¯IITâ€¯Ropar onboarding 100â€‘200 startups (Augâ€¯2025).


Business Model
SaaS tiers: $30 / startup / month and $100 / investor / month (based on seats & dataâ€‘room storage)

Marketplace takeâ€‘rateâ€¯10â€¯% on freelancer packages.

Enterprise licence for incubators & funds (whiteâ€‘label, admin analytics).

Tech & Security
PostgreSQL + Next.js, vector search (PgVector), OpenAI & Claude models + Other Fine-tuned models; AESâ€‘256 encrypted dataâ€‘rooms, auditâ€‘trail logging, GDPR/CCPA compliant. SOCâ€¯2â€¯Typeâ€¯II roadmap M+4.

Roadmap Highlights
Q3â€¯2025	Q4â€¯2025	Q1â€¯2026
AI Pitchâ€‘Deck Generatorâ€¯v1	Investor WhatsApp bot	Zeroâ€‘knowledge dataâ€‘rooms
Oneâ€‘click board pack PDF	ML ranking model v1.5	Blockchain auditâ€‘logs

Summary:
â€¢ GOAT urgently requested a one-page design for the Linkup project, emphasizing its high priority for investor communication.
â€¢ Approval for the deck content was received, with a target completion date set for Wednesday.
â€¢ Multiple one-pagers are being developed, with specific designs and content outlined during discussions.
â€¢ Henry Voyex provided a PDF of the Voyex proposal and shared a Figma link for collaborative design work.

Action Points:

â€¢ Add GOAT to the Figma project for collaborative design â€” Assigned to Henry Voyex â€” Due ASAP

Document Summary:
â€¢ No documents uploaded

Detailed Summary:
â€¢ GOAT initiated the conversation by requesting a high-priority design for the Linkup project, which aims to streamline the investment process through an AI-powered platform.
â€¢ The discussion highlighted the need for a concise one-page overview that captures essential information about the project, including its problem statement, solution, market traction, and business model.
â€¢ Henry sought clarification on the roadmap and market traction sections, indicating a focus on India for the initial presentation.
â€¢ GOAT confirmed that the design would not require a cover page, emphasizing the need for all information to fit on a single page.
â€¢ Subsequent messages confirmed the approval of the deck content, with a commitment to finalize the design by the specified deadline.
â€¢ The conversation also touched on the need for a new logo as part of the rebranding efforts for Voyex, with GOAT indicating they would follow up on this matter.

Confidence:
Confidence: High â€” The conversation provided clear directives and timelines, indicating a well-structured approach to project management.
